item.name: Call another (sub) workflow from main workflow

description.content: Here we are calling other yaml workflows from within the main workflow. We are also using JSON schema for request body and params validation

item.name: Create a user and show all users across Mongo or Postgres.

request.name: Create a user and show all users across Mongo or Postgres.

description.content: Create a user with posts and profile, as per the data model. Returns all users created so far. Demonstrate same API for both Mongo and Postgres.

description.content:
Run any three tasks in parallel. Each task can invoke a function or another workflow. 
Here we are simply returning a string in each task. 
In response, we are returning a JSON with output from 1st task
